Gets a Template Spec version from a specific Template Spec.

Azure REST API version: 2022-02-01.




## Using getTemplateSpecVersion {#using}

Two invocation forms are available. The direct form accepts plain
arguments and either blocks until the result value is available, or
returns a Promise-wrapped result. The output form accepts
Input-wrapped arguments and returns an Output-wrapped result.

## Supporting Types


<h4 id="linkedtemplateartifactresponse">Linked<wbr>Template<wbr>Artifact<wbr>Response</h4>



<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="csharp">

            title="Required">
        <span id="path_csharp">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>A filesystem safe relative path of the artifact.</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="template_csharp">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">object</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The Azure Resource Manager template.</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>
